base_description: Tall white cabinet with two sections.
part_description: Upper section has two glass doors; lower section has two solid doors. Both sections have brass handles and are rectangular in shape.
internal_interaction_description: The upper and lower sections are connected by a flat surface, allowing for structural stability. Hinges on the doors facilitate opening and closing, while handles provide grip for access to internal storage.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet interacts with the environment by providing storage space. It can hold items like dishes or books, and its flat top surface may support decorative items. Positioned against a wall, it requires sufficient floor space and height clearance.
